min-height.desc: The minimum height of the Tooltip; Size in CSS units, including unit name

min-width.desc: The minimum width of the Tooltip; Size in CSS units, including unit name

max-height.desc: The maximum height of the Tooltip; Size in CSS units, including unit name

max-width.desc: The maximum width of the Tooltip; Size in CSS units, including unit name

anchor.desc: Two values setting the starting position or anchor point of the Tooltip relative to its target

self.desc: Two values setting the Tooltip's own position relative to its target

offset.desc: An array of two numbers to offset the Tooltip horizontally and vertically in pixels

target.desc: Configure a target element to trigger Tooltip toggle; 'true' means it enables the parent DOM element, 'false' means it disables attaching events to any DOM elements; By using a String (CSS selector) it attaches the events to the specified DOM element (if it exists)

no-parent-event.desc: Skips attaching events to the target DOM element (that trigger the element to get shown)

delay.desc: Configure Tooltip to appear with delay

hide-delay.desc: Configure Tooltip to disappear with delay

updatePosition.desc: There are some custom scenarios for which Quasar cannot automatically reposition the tooltip without significant performance drawbacks so the optimal solution is for you to call this method when you need it
